title: A Thousand-Layer Cake of Sakura Lies
description:
Tenma Moe is a 16 year-old boy in high school who spends his time dressing as a girl in order to scam people. However, one day, his secret is discovered by the school's nurse! Beneath the layers of lies, what are the truths hidden between the two?

(Tagged Yaoi for ecchi, contains no smut.)

matches.title: A Story About a Boy Scouted to Be a Model
